TopicTitle: I accidently a rover. the whole rover

Articles.Content:
Yeah, I turned too sharp for the speed on minimus and crashed a rover.

The deployed antenna seemed to glitch the physics engine when I landed upside down and led to it spinning like a top upside down until Bill Kerman was thrown from it.

He survived, but now I can't select him.

I've double checked, no EVAs listed in the tracking center, it only gives me option to switch the lander or rover, but cannot get control of him again.

I suspect it was some glitch due to his being ejected from the rover causing him to not count as EVA.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-23T08:58:53Z" title="04/23/2015 08:58  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 23, 2015</time> by a.fake.name**

You accidently a rover?????????

I don't exactly understand what your problem is. You never mentioned any mods, even though you posted in the support for modded games.

Sounds like you ran into the kerbal debris glitch, theres a fix over here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97285-KSP-v0-90-Stock-Bug-Fix-Modules-%28Release-v0-1-7d-28-Feb-15%29-Misc-Utilities-%2818-Jan-15%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97285-KSP-v0-90-Stock-Bug-Fix-Modules-%28Release-v0-1-7d-28-Feb-15%29-Misc-Utilities-%2818-Jan-15%29)

Hopefully that one is fixed in 1.0
